attributes.additional_details: We have to keep Charles Darwin on the £10 note! Hopefully not have Jane Austin :/ To be honest I couldn't care less that theres ''not many women'' in the lime light! (Im a woman) Its enraging! C Darwin has been a major inspiration to a lot of people including myself! He brought foward an Idea in a time when Religion was pretty much Law and he stood by this theory til the end!

rejection.details: An e-petition already exisits for this matter title "Do not remove Charles Darwin from the ten pound note".
